List all countries and regions for which socialmixr has population data

Source: R/lists.R
wpp_countries.Rd

Uses the World Population Prospects data from the wpp2017 package

Usage

wpp_countries()

Value

list of countries

Examples

wpp_countries()
#>   [1] "Burundi"                          "Comoros"                         
#>   [3] "Djibouti"                         "Eritrea"                         
#>   [5] "Ethiopia"                         "Kenya"                           
#>   [7] "Madagascar"                       "Malawi"                          
#>   [9] "Mauritius"                        "Mayotte"                         
#>  [11] "Mozambique"                       "Réunion"                         
#>  [13] "Rwanda"                           "Seychelles"                      
#>  [15] "Somalia"                          "South Sudan"                     
#>  [17] "Uganda"                           "Tanzania"                        
#>  [19] "Zambia"                           "Zimbabwe"                        
#>  [21] "Angola"                           "Cameroon"
